original_text:
You made him for a little while lower than the angels;
    you have crowned him with glory and honor,
korean_text: 그를 잠시 동안 천사보다 못하게 하시며 영광과 존귀로 관을 씌우시며3)

sentences.original_text: You made him for a little while lower than the angels
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그를 잠시 천사들보다 낮게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: you have crowned him with glory and honor,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그에게 영광과 존귀로 관을 씌우셨습니다
